Class BodyStreamBacked

  • java.lang.Object

    BodyFileBacked

    public abstract class BodyStreamBacked
extends Object
    Intermediate implementation class to make creation of streaming sources easier.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static com.fasterxml.storemate.shared.util.BufferRecycler _bufferRecycler
      We need a basic copy-through buffer when streaming content, and since this is a very frequent operation let's use a recyclable buffer.

    • Field Detail

      • _bufferRecycler

        protected static final com.fasterxml.storemate.shared.util.BufferRecycler _bufferRecycler
        We need a basic copy-through buffer when streaming content, and since this is a very frequent operation let's use a recyclable buffer. Note that this MUST be static to use Thread-local properly.
